import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); return (

Admin Dashboard

{/* Admin Info Card */}

Admin Information

Username: {user?.username}

Email: {user?.email}

Role: {user?.role}

{/* Quick Stats Card */}

Quick Stats

Total Users: 0
Reported Posts: 0
Active Today: 0
{/* Actions Card */}

Quick Actions

{/* Recent Activity Section */}

Recent System Activity

No recent activity

System activity will appear here

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
